TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SuppressIldasmAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class SuppressIldasmAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class SuppressIldasmAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 防止 [Ildasm.exe（IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)反汇编程序集。

span.span: Prevents the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) from disassembling an assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将应用属性以防止程序集或模块的程序集或模块用分解[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)。Apply the attribute to an assembly or module to prevent the assembly or module from being disassembled using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md). 此属性不会阻止程序集从正在使用反射来查看。This attribute does not prevent an assembly from being viewed using reflection. 请注意，属性不会阻止[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)查看标头信息和元信息。Note that attribute does not block the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) from viewing header information and meta-information. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何应用属性为程序集。The following code example demonstrates how to apply the attribute to an assembly. [!code-csharp[Runtime.CompilerServices.SuppressIldasmAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.CompilerServices.SuppressIldasmAttribute/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Runtime.CompilerServices.SuppressIldasmAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.CompilerServices.SuppressIldasmAttribute/vb/sample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将应用属性以防止程序集或模块的程序集或模块用分解[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)。Apply the attribute to an assembly or module to prevent the assembly or module from being disassembled using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何应用属性为程序集。The following code example demonstrates how to apply the attribute to an assembly. [!code-csharp[Runtime.CompilerServices.SuppressIldasmAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.CompilerServices.SuppressIldasmAttribute/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Runtime.CompilerServices.SuppressIldasmAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.CompilerServices.SuppressIldasmAttribute/vb/sample.vb#1)]
